titles.title: Condemning the Cable News Network (CNN) for utilizing images from an imbedded photojournalist with prior knowledge of the October 7th attack on Israel.
Condemning the Cable News Network (CNN) for utilizing images from an imbedded photojournalist with prior knowledge of the October 7th attack on Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns the use of images captured by photojournalists with advance knowledge of the October 7, 2023, attack against Israel. It also stands against complicity in attacks against civilians.
